work.name: Technolog.ch
work.summary: Successfully implemented artificial intelligence to cut the time needed to build a backend using ChatGpt. The backend was developed using object-oriented programming with C#, the .net Core framework and Swagger for the Rest API documentation.

work.name: Tesla Media Group
work.summary: Transcribed text documents with SEO for the Joomla content management system (CMS), which operates under the PHP language. These documents were blog articles aimed at improving search engine positioning, thus generating greater monthly traffic of visitors that eventually converted into sales.

benefits.title: Strategic Support and Long-Term Vision
benefits.body: I get involved in a project from start to finish, making sure it grows as your business grows too.

benefits.title: Analytical Approach and Tailored Solutions
benefits.body: I analyze every detail of the sales or client acquisition process to propose strategies that boost your conversions and visibility.

benefits.title: Comprehensive Experience and Detailed Attention
benefits.body: Beyond web development, my background in customer service, sales, and accounting allows me to approach projects with a more complete vision, focused on real results and market differentiation.

inner.prop1: What makes your web development service different?
inner.prop2: I don‚Äôt use CMS platforms like WordPress‚ÄîI build everything from scratch for greater customization and performance.

inner.prop1: How does a quality website impact a business?
inner.prop2: It‚Äôs your brand‚Äôs first impression online, conveying trust, security, and professionalism.

inner.prop1: What strategies do you use to improve SEO?
inner.prop2: It depends on the business‚Äîit could be local SEO, content creation, or improving customer service touchpoints.

inner.prop1: How long does it take to see SEO results?
inner.prop2: Initial results can appear in 6 to 12 months. Optimal results usually show after 1 to 2 years.

inner.prop1: What types of businesses benefit most from SEO?
inner.prop2: Service providers (like construction companies, clinics, restaurants), online stores, marketing agencies, and more.

inner.prop1: What are the most common issues you fix?
inner.prop2: Slow loading times, heavy files, server performance issues, and accessibility problems.

inner.prop1: How does my website's loading speed affect me?
inner.prop2: If your site takes more than 2‚Äì3 seconds to load, users may leave before even seeing it.

inner.prop1: Do you only do technical optimization, or also UX/UI improvements?
inner.prop2: Mostly technical‚Äîbut if needed, I also enhance navigation and user flows to boost conversions.

inner.prop1: What does your web maintenance service include?
inner.prop2: Software updates, regular backups, and security improvements.

inner.prop1: How often should a site be maintained?
inner.prop2: It depends‚Äîsome websites need updates every 6 months, others weekly or monthly.

inner.prop1: Do you only maintain websites you‚Äôve built?
inner.prop2: Preferably yes, but I‚Äôm open to reviewing external sites if needed.
